prompt.focus: Make sure the photodiode is covering the spot and any external recordings have begun before continuing.
prompt.fullscreen: Press 'cmd + ctrl + F' to toggle Fullscreen.
prompt.zoom: Zoom in to enlarge the screen.

welcome.large_window: Please make this window as large as possible.

instructions.fixate: For the next 2 minutes, fixate on the dot in the middle of the screen and try to relax.
instructions.close_eyes: For this next section, close your eyes when you hear a "beep", and open when you hear another "beep".
instructions.tap_ins: For this next section, start tapping the device in your chest when you hear a "beep", and stop when you hear another "beep".
instructions.tap_lead: For this next section, start tapping the leads behind your ear when you hear a "beep", and stop when you hear another "beep".
instructions.stretch_neck_left: For the next 20 seconds, start stretching your neck to the left and back to the center a few times when you hear a "beep", and stop when you hear another "beep".
instructions.stretch_neck_right: For the next 20 seconds, start stretching your neck to the right and back to the center a few times when you hear a "beep", and stop when you hear another "beep".
instructions.align_photodiode: Make sure the photodiode is aligned and the EEG recording has begun before continuing.
instructions.camera: Make sure the camera is pointing to you and your face is within the camera area.

tap_ins: tap the device in your chest.
tap_lead: tap the leads behind your ear.
stretch_neck_left: Stretch your neck to the left and back to the center a few times.
stretch_neck_right: Stretch your neck to the right and back to the center a few times.
